original: Failed Bio-Weapon
translation: 失败的生物武器

original: Canned Survivor
translation: 罐头幸存者

original: Bio-Weapon Lab
translation: 生物武器实验室

original: From the moment you opened your eyes you knew you were a failure, a reject.  Destined to be something great but many a mistake took that away from you.  You awoke in a world of monsters, but you're determined to prove you aren't one of them.
translation: 从你睁开眼睛的那一刻起，你就知道自己是一个失败者，一个被拒绝的人。注定是一件伟大的事情，但许多错误夺走了你。你在一个怪物的世界里醒来，但你决心证明你不是他们中的一员。

original: You were a very busy person. That's why you bought a can of survival items and called it a day. Now it's the only thing you have.
translation: 你是个很忙的人。这就是为什么你买了一罐生存物品，并宣布今天结束。现在这是你唯一拥有的东西了。

original: You woke up, where are you?  Who are you?  What are you?!  That doesn't matter right now... you have a bad feeling...
translation: 你醒了，你在哪里？你是谁？你是干什么的？！现在没关系了…你有种不好的感觉…

original: Fungus Failed Bio-Weapon
translation: 真菌生物武器

original: Prepper
translation: 准备者

original: Mycus B.W.M.D
translation: 粘菌病

original: Assimilation process is complete, incorporation and modification of biology and bionics into our system was successful.  Protection of our new domain and brethren is our current objective.  Inability to remove previous DNA marker is but a minor setback.
translation: 同化过程是完整的，生物和仿生学在我们的系统中的整合和改造是成功的。保护我们的新领域和兄弟是我们目前的目标。无法移除先前的DNA标记只是一个小小的挫折。

original: You were paranoid about the world ending so you jumped on the prepper bandwagon. You read a book on survival and got yourself a gun pack and some gear. The cataclysm was not what you expected.
translation: 你对世界末日有点偏执所以你加入了预科生的行列。你读了一本关于生存的书，给自己带了一个枪包和一些装备。这场灾难不是你所预料的。

original: After mycus assimilation was successful, our local system was instructed to claim more territory for the mycus. Hostile organisms are near, proceed with caution.
translation: 在mycus同化成功后，我们的地方系统被指示为mycus申请更多的领土。有敌方生物靠近，小心行事。

original: Fungal Territory
translation: 真菌区

original: Bio-Weapon Alpha
translation: 生物武器阿尔法

original: Prepper Household
translation: 预科生家庭

original: 'The Predator'.  You were the first, the Alpha.  Created to sow chaos behind enemy lines, driven by hunger.  You awoke into the unknown with an appetite - good thing the world is full of prey to devour!
translation: “掠夺者”。你是第一个，阿尔法。在饥饿的驱使下，在敌后制造混乱。你带着一种渴望醒来进入未知世界——世界上充满了可以吞食的好东西！

original: You knew something was coming, you prepared, when the dead rose, you knew what to do. With your house now barricaded, it's time to put your plan into action.
translation: 你知道有什么事要发生，你做好了准备，当死去的玫瑰升起时，你知道该怎么办。把你的计划付诸行动吧。

original: Boarded Up House
translation: 用木板围起来的房子

original: Bio-Weapon Delta
translation: 生物武器三角洲

original: Slave Fighter's Freedom
translation: 奴隶战士的自由

original: 'The Infiltrator', created to infiltrate, scout, spy and assassinate.  Capable of taking down enemies from afar, exploring enemy territory and integrating into the local populace.  You awoke to chaos, and you plan to eliminate whoever caused it.
translation: “渗透者”，用来渗透，侦察，间谍和暗杀。能够从远处打倒敌人，探索敌国领土，融入当地民众。你意识到了混乱，你计划消灭造成混乱的人。

original: All your life you have been experimented on and forced to fight others for the amusement of your masters. Never having seen the sun or the outside the cataclysm gave you a chance at freedom. Now you just have to escape from your fellow combatants...
translation: 在你的一生中，你一直在试验，并被迫与他人战斗，以取悦你的主人。从未见过太阳或外面的灾难给了你一个自由的机会。现在你只需要逃离你的战友…

original: Sketchy Cabin
translation: 简陋的小屋

original: Bio-Weapon Beta
translation: 生物武器测试版

original: Experimental Soldier Start
translation: 实验兵出发

original: 'The Immortal', designed to be a one-man army.  Your body is a lethal weapon, finely tuned arms and defenses ready to destroy anything standing in your way.  You awoke to a horde of enemies, so now you take them all on.
translation: “不朽的军队”，设计成一支不朽的军队。你的身体是一个致命的武器，精心调整的武器和防御准备摧毁任何站在你的方式。你醒来时发现了一大群敌人，所以现在你要把他们都打败。

original: You were part of a an advanced infantry unit, deployed to one of several 'priority sites' as part of a last-ditch effort to get the situation under control.  Delays and casualties led to you being the only one left by the time you reached the objective, and things aren't looking any better.
translation: 你曾是一支先进步兵部队的一员，被部署到几个“重点地点”之一，作为控制局势的最后努力的一部分。延误和伤亡导致你是唯一一个离开的时候，你达到了目标，事情看起来没有任何好转。

original: Priority Site
translation: 优先站点

original: Bio-Weapon Gamma
translation: 生物武器伽马射线

original: 'The Mechanic', created to sabotage, destroy, assimilate or repair bio-technology.  You are a walking, adaptive repair machine.  You awoke to the sounds of machines fighting abominations.  You could help them, or destroy them, if they get in your way.
translation: “机械师”，用来破坏、破坏、吸收或修复生物技术。你是一台可行走的自适应维修机器。你醒来时听到机器与可憎的事物搏斗的声音。如果他们挡了你的路，你可以帮助他们，或者摧毁他们。

original: Super Soldier
translation: 超级战士

original: The infantry of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of many augmented soldiers to be deployed into a battle field to ensure victory.  With range and melee capabilities, you engage enemies en masse.
translation: 超级士兵项目的步兵。你是众多被部署到战场以确保胜利的增援士兵之一。有了射程和近战能力，你就可以和敌人一起战斗。

original: Super Scout
translation: 超级侦察兵

original: The sniper of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of a few augmented soldiers to be used for reconnaissance and V.I.P assassinations.  With your weapons and skills, you can eliminate key targets after living for weeks in enemy territory.
translation: 超级战士项目的狙击手。你是为数不多的用于侦察和V.I.P暗杀的增援士兵之一。凭借你的武器和技能，你可以在敌方领土上生活数周后消灭关键目标。

original: Super Bio-engineer
translation: 超级生物工程师

original: Biological and mechanical repair unit, the combat engineer of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of many augmented military mechanics to be used as a repair module.  With repair, medical and general electronic capabilities, you can maybe fix the world.
translation: 生物和机械修理股，超级战士项目的作战工程师。你是众多被用作维修舱的增强型军事机械师之一。有了维修、医疗和通用电子功能，你也许可以修复这个世界。

original: Super Juggernaut
translation: 超级巨无霸

original: The tank of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of a few augmented soldiers to be used as a heavy support to infantry.  With ranged, armor and regenerative capabilities, you can endure heavy damage and return it in kind.
translation: 超级战士项目的坦克。你是为数不多的增援士兵中的一员，可以作为步兵的重型支援。拥有远程，装甲和再生能力，你可以承受重伤害并以实物归还。

original: Slave Fighter (Blade)
translation: 奴隶战斗机（刀片）

original: You were augmented with a blade, and enhancements to your speed and reaction time. You can hit an opponent multiple times before they land a blow.
translation: 你增加了一个刀片，提高了你的速度和反应时间。你可以在一个对手落下一击之前打他多次。

original: Slave Fighter (Claws)
translation: 奴隶战士（爪子）

original: You were augmented with some claws, and enhancements to your reflexes. You deliver a powerful strike that neutralizes foes in few hits.
translation: 你被一些爪子增强了，你的反射能力也增强了。你的攻击威力强大，能在几次打击中消灭敌人。

original: Slave Fighter (Shocker)
translation: 奴隶战士（震惊）

original: You were augmented with electrical generators and protection from them. You hit multiple foes with electricity, frying them until their nervous system gives up.
translation: 你被增援发电机和保护他们。你用电击打多个敌人，油炸他们直到他们的神经系统停止。

original: Slave Fighter (Weapon Master)
translation: 奴隶战士（武器大师）

original: You have been augmented with many 'passive' combat bionics, they merely aid you but are not weapons in and of themselves. You have been trained to use all sorts of different weapons, including your fists. You can pretty much weaponize a sock.
translation: 你已经被许多“被动”的战斗仿生学所增强，它们只是帮助你，而不是武器本身。你已经被训练使用各种不同的武器，包括你的拳头。你几乎可以把袜子武器化。

original: zombie augmented abomination
translation: 僵尸强化憎恶

original: zombie super soldier pistol
translation: 僵尸超级战士手枪

original: a pained groan.
translation: 痛苦的呻吟。

original: Bio-Weapon
translation: 生物武器

original: A zombified, heavily-augmented mutant of some sort.  Dangerous on its own, but even more so in groups.
translation: 一种僵尸，大量增加的某种变种。它本身就很危险，但在群体中更是如此。

original: Version of the NEO-33 for use by monsters, with explicit overrides to ensure that it won't light players on fire.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 版本的NEO-33供怪物使用，有明确的覆盖，以确保它不会点燃玩家的火。如果你找到其中一个，这就是一个虫子！

original: This is a bug, report to Noctifer if you see this.
translation: 这是一个错误，如果你看到这个报告Noctifer。

original: a roar of anger!
translation: 怒吼！

original: All your enhancements came short of immortality.
translation: 你所有的强化物都没有长生不老。

original: an electric crackle!
translation: 电的噼啪声！

original: You are not human.  You can't even remember anymore, whether you were ever human to begin with.  What matters is that now, you are more than human.
translation: 你不是人类。你甚至都不记得了，你是否曾经是人类。现在重要的是，你不仅仅是人类。

original: Sentinel Physicality I
translation: 哨兵体质I

original: <BGSS_intro_question>
translation: <BGSS_intro_question>

original: Command Center Members
translation: 指挥中心成员

original: Find A Bio-Weapon Badge
translation: 找到生化武器徽章

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has improved your muscular development.  Your maximum stamina, stamina regeneration, and maximum weight carried is 25% greater, and you heal slightly faster.  In exchange, your metabolism and thirst is slightly increased, and your body runs a bit warm.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗改善了你的肌肉发育。你的最大耐力、耐力恢复和携带的最大重量增加25%，并且你的治疗速度稍微快一点。作为交换，你的新陈代谢和口渴稍微增加，你的身体运行有点温暖。

original: Your genome is unique to you, this is a DNA marker identifying you as Bio-Weapon Alpha.  It may prove useful one day.
translation: 你的基因组对你来说是独一无二的，这是一个DNA标记，表明你是生物武器阿尔法。总有一天会有用的。

original: Members of the Command Center seeking refuge from ...something.  They have intel and some connections to the Old Guard.
translation: 指挥中心的人在寻求…某物的庇护。他们有情报和一些旧警卫的联系。

original: How did you find out so much about the labs?
translation: 你怎么知道这么多关于实验室的事？

original: What happened?
translation: 怎么搞的？

original: I can tell you're one of us, Hunter.  I was expecting an officer, not a college student.
translation: 我知道你是我们中的一员，亨特。我在等一个军官，不是大学生。

original: Super Soldiers
translation: 超级战士

original: Another survivor!  We should travel together.
translation: 又一个幸存者！我们应该一起旅行。

original: Yeah, I am one of them.
translation: 是的，我就是其中之一。

original: It says you're a Bio-Weapon?
translation: 上面说你是生化武器？

original: What's with the badge?  A Bio-Weapon, it says?
translation: 徽章是怎么回事？上面说是生物武器？

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: You seem to know a lot more than you're letting on.
translation: 你好像知道的比你说的要多。

original: Ragtag branch of the military that survived the initial cataclysm.   Allied to the command center, they seek leadership in this new world.
translation: 在最初的大灾难中幸存下来的军队的一个支部。他们与指挥中心结盟，在这个新世界寻求领导权。

original: What are you doing?
translation: 你在做什么？

original: Part of the Super Soldier project, actually.
translation: 实际上是超级战士计划的一部分。

original: Kinda boring here huh?
translation: 这里有点无聊吧？

original: Can I have some directions?
translation: 能给我指路吗？

original: "Scanning area…"
translation: “扫描区域…”

original: Care to trade?
translation: 想交易吗？

original: Bio-Weapon?
translation: 生物武器？

original: [MISSION] Router suggested that I talk to you about joining the hunt for Apophis.
translation: Router建议我和你谈谈加入追捕Apophis的行动。

original: How are things here?
translation: 这里怎么样？

original: <done_conversation_section>
translation: <done_conversation_section>

original: Glad to see you too buddy, let's go now!
translation: 很高兴见到你，伙计，我们走吧！

original: What's going on out here?
translation: 外面怎么了？

original: How are you holding up?  Router asked that I check on you.
translation: 你还好吗？路由器让我去看看你。

original: Can I stay here?
translation: 我能呆在这儿吗？

original: "Systems check… er-ror…"
translation: “系统检查…错误…”

original: <end_talking>
translation: <end_talking>

original: Preppers
translation: 预科生

original: Bye.
translation: 再见。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这里干什么？

original: Well, bye.
translation: 好吧，再见。

original: What's going on?
translation: 发生什么事？

original: survivor's archer backpack
translation: 幸存者弓箭手背包

original: laser gatling arm
translation: 激光转管臂

original: gasoline synthesizing blob glob
translation: 汽油合成滴球

original: They had me set up and ready to follow a paper trail, check up on a small handful of lab projects.  Degree in computer engineering and a brief stint as an officer candidate before all this.
translation: 他们把我安排好，准备跟踪记录，检查一些实验室项目。计算机工程学位，在此之前有短暂的军官候选人经历。

original: Survivors who had prepared for the cataclysm before the idea of it was on the radar.  They possess the means to rebuild.
translation: 生还者在大灾变的想法出现之前就已经做好了准备。他们拥有重建的手段。

original: Greetings.  Damn, I was hoping to run into somebody else… at least we're both still in one piece, I guess.
translation: 问候语。妈的，我本来想撞上其他人的…至少我们两个还合二为一，我想。

original: What should we do?
translation: 我们该怎么办？

original: I really hope that badge belongs to you…
translation: 我真的希望徽章是属于你的…

original: Heh, another one caught in this mess, huh?
translation: 嘿，又有一个被困在这个烂摊子里了，是吗？

original: Hello there, hotshot, try not to break anything, ok?
translation: 你好，帅哥，别弄坏任何东西，好吗？

original: Why are the others attacking us?
translation: 为什么其他人攻击我们？

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: A custom-built backpack modified further to be an archer's best friend.  Lots of storage, manageable encumbrance and a built in quiver.
translation: 一个定制的背包被进一步改装成弓箭手最好的朋友。大量的存储，可管理的负担和内置箭袋。

original: Your left arm is currently transformed into a ups powered laser gatling gun.  Fire it as if it was any other gun.
translation: 你的左臂现在变成了一个ups供电的激光转管枪。把它当作其他枪一样开枪。

original: The mechanics volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from simple machines to the inner workings of submarine engines in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科全书的力学卷。这本书包含了从简单的机器到潜艇引擎内部工作的所有细节。作为基本模式，它跳过了理论，建议先修的同伴书的知识。

original: A piece of glob that has begun to create gasoline when exposed to the sun.  The gasoline it creates is too mixed up with the glob to be extracted but is still flammable.
translation: 一块暴露在阳光下开始产生汽油的球体。它产生的汽油与球体混合太多，无法提取，但仍然易燃。

original: Exertion
translation: 用力

original: Bloodlust
translation: 嗜血

original: "Die!"
translation: “死吧！”

original: I was working my way through a college degree.  Computer engineering stuff, and that helped get me where I am now.  I was at home actually when this started, putting the final pieces on the side project that led me here.
translation: 我在努力攻读大学学位。计算机工程的东西，这帮我找到了现在的位置。当这一切开始的时候我就在家里，把最后的部分放在我来这里的项目上。

original: Holy shit man, you are still alive?!  I'm glad, I thought I was going to have to deal with all this alone.  We got this place far away and are safe for now.  It's now you and me, just like old times!
translation: 天哪，你还活着？！我很高兴，我以为我得一个人处理这一切。我们到了很远的地方，现在很安全。现在是你和我，就像以前一样！

original: Anything I can do for you?
translation: 有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

original: Hey visitor, anything exciting out there?
translation: 嘿，客人，有什么令人兴奋的事吗？

original: Hey.  Anything I can help you with, visitor?
translation: 嘿。有什么需要我帮忙的吗，客人？

original: Welcome.  Try not to cause any trouble and things will be just fine.
translation: 欢迎光临。尽量不要惹麻烦，事情会好起来的。

original: Follow my lead, I'll get us out of here.
translation: 跟着我，我会带我们离开这里。

original: Holy shit girl, you are still alive?!  I'm glad, I thought I was going to have to deal with all this alone. We got this place far away and are safe for now.  It's now you and me, just like old times!
translation: 该死的女孩，你还活着？！我很高兴，我以为我得一个人处理这一切。我们到了很远的地方，现在很安全。现在是你和我，就像以前一样！

original: I'll help get you out of here.
translation: 我会帮你离开这里。

original: So now what are you going to do?
translation: 那现在你打算怎么办？

original: You feel worn out and empty inside.
translation: 你会觉得筋疲力尽，内心空虚。

original: You thirst for blood!
translation: 你渴望鲜血！

original: metal scraping against metal!
translation: 金属与金属摩擦！

original: Bio-Weapons
translation: 生物武器

original: That thing you are wearing… a Bio-Weapon Badge…
translation: 你戴的那个…生物武器徽章…

original: Anything I can help with?
translation: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: You learned how to handle yourself in the cataclysm.  Whether armed or unarmed, you know how to use your wits to stay alive.  Survival is of the highest priority.
translation: 你学会了在灾难中如何处理自己。不管是武装的还是非武装的，你都知道如何运用你的智慧来生存。生存是重中之重。

original: Survivor Combatives Manual
translation: 幸存者战斗手册

original: Superalloy Composite
translation: 高温合金复合材料

original: leather skirt
translation: 皮裙

original: JOINT RESEARCH PROJECT TO INCREASE JOBS: A recent announcement confirmed rumors of a joint research project between several commercial and military research firms, with the stated goal of collaborating to advance several cutting-edge fields.  Though details are still sparse at this time, the project is expected to open thousands of employment opportunities in various fields and departments.
translation: 联合研究项目以增加就业机会：最近的一项公告证实了有关几家商业和军事研究公司联合开展研究项目的传闻，其明确目标是合作推进几个前沿领域。尽管目前细节仍不多，但该项目预计将在各个领域和部门提供数千个就业机会。

original: CBM Induction
translation: 导电CBM

original: Grab Break
translation: 抓斗休息

original: solar flashlight (off)
translation: 太阳能手电筒（关）

original: Got it.
translation: 知道了。

original: Creations of an unknown project with links to the cataclysm.  Allied to the command center since they are their creation.
translation: 与大灾变有关的未知项目的创建。与指挥中心结盟，因为他们是他们的创造者。

original: Hey you, are you also after the Bio-Weapons?
translation: 嘿，你也在找武器？

original: I'm in the same boat, it seems.
translation: 看来我是同舟共济。

original: Bio_weapons?
translation: 生化武器？

original: I see.
translation: 我懂了。

original: So, what can I help you with?
translation: 那么，我能帮你什么？

original: Your bloodlust wears off.  You feel AWFUL!
translation: 你的嗜血欲望消失了。你感觉糟透了！

original: bad
translation: 坏的

original: You steady yourself, prepared for the fights ahead.
translation: 你要稳住自己，为未来的战斗做好准备。

original: %s prepares for the fights ahead.
translation: %s为前面的战斗做准备。

original: A very lengthy and boring journal with tutorials on various unorthodox combat mechanics.
translation: 一本很长很无聊的日记，里面有各种非正统的战斗机制的教程。

original: Charges the user's bionic reserves via induction.
translation: 通过导电向用户的仿生储备充电。

original: The %s tries to grab you, but you force yourself free!
translation: %s试图抓住你，但你强迫自己自由！

original: The %s tries to grab <npcname>, but they break free!
translation: %s试图抢<npcname>，但他们挣脱了！

original: solar flashlights (off)
translation: 太阳能手电筒（关）

original: Seems it's harder to conceal that than I thought.  You're right, and I suppose that also confirms I can trust you with this.  Though you're wrong about that last bit, didn't stay a CO for very long.  Long story, don't ask.  Just be careful who you reveal this information to, okay?
translation: 似乎比我想象的更难掩饰。你说得对，我想这也证实了我可以信任你。虽然你在最后一点上错了，但我没在公司待太久。说来话长，别问了。小心你把这些信息透露给谁，好吗？

original: I'm one of the super soldiers, in fact.
translation: 事实上，我是超级战士之一。

original: Used to be an old lab bunker.  We had the lower level gutted and remodeled to make it livable.  Better than nothing at least.
translation: 以前是个旧的实验室掩体。我们把下层的房子挖了出来，重新装修，使之适于居住。总比什么都没有好。

original: Any advice for dealing with a bio-weapon?
translation: 对处理生物武器有什么建议吗？

original: BLOOD SPORT STING: Police and Federal officials have uncovered the latest lead on a series of underground "gladiator games" involving kidnapped victims forcibly augmented and pitted against each other.  The latest sting has led to the rescue of several victims, but no suspects have been identified or arrested thus far.
translation: 血腥运动刺痛：警方和联邦官员发现了一系列地下“角斗士游戏”的最新线索，这些游戏涉及被绑架的受害者被强行增援，并相互对峙。最近的一次刺痛导致数名受害者获救，但迄今尚未确认或逮捕任何嫌疑人。

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged.  The battery is soldered in place, and requires sunlight or a recharging station to charge.
translation: 这是一个重型LED太阳能手电筒。使用这个手电筒会打开它，并提供光，假设它是充电的。电池焊接到位，需要阳光或充电站充电。

original: Well, damn.
translation: 好吧，该死。

original: I see…
translation: 我明白了…

original: It's a refuge, made for the Bio-Weapon research team.  I happened to be one of the guards of the project.  It turned into a mess real quick.  Only one of the original scientists is still here.
translation: 这是一个避难所，是为生物武器研究小组设计的。我碰巧是这个项目的警卫之一。很快就变得一团糟。只有一位最早的科学家还在这里。

original: mutagenic hemoampoule
translation: 致突变血安瓿

original: Elusiveness
translation: 难以捉摸

original: inhuman laughter!
translation: 不人道的笑声！

original: Slave Fighters (Blue Team)
translation: 奴隶战士（蓝队）

original: What are those things?
translation: 那些是什么东西？

original: Yeah, same augmentation project your badge labels you as, assuming that belongs to you.  Router found me passed out and told me about everything.  I don't remember anything before that.  Guess I just have to trust him for now.
translation: 是的，和你的徽章上的标签一样，假设那是属于你的。路由器发现我昏倒了，把一切都告诉了我。在那之前我什么都不记得了。我现在只能相信他了。

original: Military augmentation project, same people handing out the badge you're wearing.  Guessing you know enough about it if you have one yourself.  Don't remember much up until Router found me and took me in, same deal as Sigma.
translation: 军事增援计划，和你戴的徽章是同一个人。如果你自己也有一个的话，我猜你对它了解得够多了。直到路由器找到我并把我带进去，我才记得太多，和西格玛一样。

original: Oh, okay.
translation: 哦，好吧。

original: A resinous capsule filled with what looks like congealed blood, mixed with mutagenic compounds.  Not as strong as mutagenic serum, but will require a syringe to use.
translation: 一种含有树脂的胶囊，里面装着看起来像凝固的血液，混合着致突变的化合物。没有诱变血清那么强，但需要注射器才能使用。

original:
Quick and fluid movements make you harder to catch.

+1 Dodge attempts, Dodge skill increased by 25%% of Intelligence, immunity to knockdown.
Lasts for 1 turn.
translation:
快速流畅的动作让你更难被抓住。

+1闪避尝试，闪避技能增加智力的25%，对击倒免疫。
持续1圈。

original: Alphavoltaic Power
translation: 阿尔法伏特电源

original: "I'm in awe of the size of that one shambler I saw.  Absolute UNIT"
translation: “我对我看到的那只摇摇晃晃的大家伙感到敬畏。“绝对单位”

original: concrete wall with glass port
translation: 带玻璃孔的混凝土墙

original: You're right.  I'd rather not talk too much about the details, but I'm on a mission to find out what happened and get in touch with anyone still alive.
translation: 你说得对。我不想谈论太多细节，但我的任务是找出发生了什么，并与任何仍然活着的人取得联系。

original: People who all their lives have seen nothing but fighting in a ring for the amusement of the rich.  Most of the saner captives and new meat end up in Blue Team, pitted against hardened and "broken in" combatants.
translation: 一辈子都没见过的人，只不过是为了富人的娱乐而斗殴。大多数理智的俘虏和新的肉食最终都会加入蓝色的队伍，和僵硬的“磨合”的战斗人员进行较量。

original: That's what the label says, it's a sorta augmentation project.  You seem to know your stuff, guess one doesn't simply find this place by accident.  Router told me what I am.  I am stuck here until further notice.
translation: 标签上是这么说的，这是一个增强项目。你好像很了解你的东西，我猜你不是偶然找到这个地方的。路由器告诉我我是什么。我被困在这里，直到另行通知。

original: A military augmentation project.  Not that sort of bio-weapon if that's what you're thinking, it's not contagious.  More like we're living weapons basically.  Guess you already know a bit for you to have made it here.  Not much else I can tell you, just stuck here waiting.
translation: 军事增援项目。不是那种生物武器如果你这么想的话，它不会传染。更像是活的武器。我猜你已经知道了一点，你已经在这里了。我没什么可说的，就在这里等着。

original: You want the grand tour, ask the guard that's usually lounging around in the rec room, downstairs.  My duty's up here, and there's not much to see topside.  Just some fields tilled and a shed for storage.  All the interesting stuff is downstairs.
translation: 如果你想参加盛大的巡演，就去问通常在楼下娱乐室闲逛的警卫。我的任务在上面，上面没什么可看的。只是一些耕地和仓库。所有有趣的东西都在楼下。

original: Farewell.
translation: 再会。

original: Biostim
translation: 生物时代

original: Biostim Overdose
translation: Biostim过量

original: "Saw a whole fuckton of the big ones the other day.  The live ones, followin' an even bigger fucker covered in armor.  Just walked through a horde like nothing."
translation: “前几天看到一大堆大家伙。活人，跟着一个更大的穿盔甲的混蛋。只是在一个部落里走来走去。”

original: Counter Sweep
translation: 计数器扫描

original: A plain, utilitarian concrete wall, with windows made of incredibly thick glass set in to allow viewing through.  Easily two or more inches thick and only a couple feet tall, breaking your way through this would not be easy.
translation: 一堵朴素、实用的混凝土墙，窗户由非常厚的玻璃制成，可以透过窗户观看。很容易两英寸或更多厚，只有几英尺高，突破这将是不容易的。

original: a resounding, animalistic roar!
translation: 一声响亮的动物咆哮！

original: Not good.  I had another person with me when I arrived, and he was guarding the vehicle when those things showed up.  Luckily they seemed reluctant to barge into the bunker, and things are getting hectic out there as it seems my buddy took a couple of them out before he bit it, and they started getting back up…
translation: 不好的。当我到达的时候，我有另外一个人陪着我，当那些东西出现的时候，他正在看管车。幸运的是，他们似乎不愿意闯入掩体，外面的事情变得越来越繁忙，因为我的伙伴似乎在咬它之前就把它们拿了出来，它们开始爬起来…

original: Will do.
translation: 就行了。

original: You've got the badge, huh?  I am listening.
translation: 你有徽章，是吗？我在听。

original: "they look like the dead but they SHOOT LIKE MEN"
translation: “他们看起来像死人，但射击像人”

original: You dodge and send %s tumbling to the ground
translation: 你躲闪一下，把%s摔倒在地

original: <npcname> dodges and trips %s
translation: <npcname>躲闪和绊倒%s

original: Sure!  This is the recreation room and lobby, and the kitchen is next to it.  Down there is the main hallway.  First door on the left is the dormitory, the Bio-Weapons are usually there.  Across from that is just a bunch of junk metal.  Down the hall you have the restroom on the right, then the research room on the left.  Our leader, Router, is there.  He can be a weirdo but he keeps us safe.  Go talk to people if you need anything.
translation: 当然！这是娱乐室和大堂，厨房就在旁边。下面是主走廊。左边的第一个门是宿舍，生物武器通常都在那里。对面就是一堆废金属。沿着大厅往下走，洗手间在右边，研究室在左边。我们的领导人，路由器，在那里。他可以保护我们。如果你需要什么，去和别人谈谈。

original: Alright.
translation: 好吧。

original: Hey there!  Welcome to the Command Center.
translation: 嘿，那里！欢迎来到指挥中心。

original: Your muscles feel abnormally tense and it's hard to sit still.
translation: 你的肌肉感到异常紧张，很难坐着不动。

original: Your heart feels like it's going a mile a minute, and every muscle in your body is sore.
translation: 你的心脏感觉像每分钟走一英里，你身体的每一块肌肉都酸痛。

original: Active Defense
translation: 主动防御

original: "The great wheel turns, I got lasers for days!  Or until my arms fall off."
translation: “伟大的车轮转动，我有激光好几天了！或者直到我的胳膊掉下来。”

original: "RD-Z-13… Unit One, fully operational…"
translation: “RD-Z-13……一号机组，全面运行…”

original: I don't know much more than what I could scrape together over a year of picking apart the details.  Really not much to say.
translation: 我只知道一年来我能拼凑出多少细节。真的没什么好说的。

original: Slave Fighters (Red Team)
translation: 奴隶战士（红队）

original: I'm not one of them.  You can trust me.
translation: 我不是他们中的一员。你可以相信我。

original: Good enough.  Stand here, keep an eye on things, sometimes take potshots at anything that shambles up to the fence.  At least it isn't as boring when that happens.
translation: 够好了。站在这里，看着周围的东西，有时对任何乱七八糟的东西开枪。至少这种情况发生的时候没有那么无聊。

original:
The best defense is a good offense.

+1 Block attempts, damage blocked increased by 100%% of Intelligence.
Lasts 2 turns.
translation:
最好的防守是好的进攻。

+1格挡尝试，格挡伤害提升100%智力。
持续2圈。

original: Pressurized hydrogen
translation: 加压氢

original: "Had a nice little place out innawoods until my dumb shit friends had the nerve to die on me.  Place turned into a mess in a hurry."
translation: “在我那些愚蠢的朋友胆敢死在我身上之前，我在一个很好的小地方。这地方一下子变成了一片狼藉。”

original: solar flashlight (on)
translation: 太阳能手电筒（开）

original: Chemistry Station
translation: 化学站

original: mounted UPS rifle
translation: 安装式UPS步枪

original: Survivor's Militarized RV
translation: 幸存者的军事化房车

original: paper Minie ball cartridge
translation: 迷你纸球墨盒

original: People who all their lives have seen nothing but fighting in a ring for the amusement of the rich. Devoid of reason they think the cataclysm is but another round, barely able to tell each other apart from the other team.
translation: 一辈子都没见过的人，只不过是为了富人的娱乐而斗殴。他们毫无理由地认为这场大灾难不过是另一轮，几乎无法区分对方和对方。

original: I don't want to end up like those things.  I don't want to become a monster, please…
translation: 我不想最后变成那样。我不想变成怪物，拜托…

original: Looks about right.  Can be hard to tell for sure if that's your badge or not, but they contracted the work out to all sorts of weirdos, and they made all sorts of crazy shit.  They could slap the Bio-Weapon label on a zombie swinging around a sword and it still wouldn't be the strangest thing out there.
translation: 看起来不错。很难确定那是不是你的徽章，但是他们把工作承包给了各种各样的怪人，他们制造了各种各样的疯狂的东西。他们可以把生物武器的标签贴在一个围绕着剑摇摆的僵尸身上，这仍然不是最奇怪的事情。

original: Guess that explains where you got the badge.
translation: 我猜这就解释了你从哪里拿到徽章的。

original: The tension in your body finally fades back to some degree of normalcy.
translation: 你身体里的紧张最终会消退到某种程度的正常状态。

original: "MANKIND IS OBSOLETE"
translation: “人类已经过时了”

original: solar flashlights (on)
translation: 太阳能手电筒（开）

original: A paper cartridge containing black powder and a Minie ball.  A paper enclosed version of the historic projectile of the USA Civil war.  The Minie ball is still as deadly and accurate as ever.
translation: 一种装有黑色粉末和小球的纸筒。美国南北战争历史性炮弹的一个纸质版本。迷你球仍然像以前一样致命和准确。

original: "Systems check.  Systems normal."
translation: “系统检查。系统正常。”

original: I'm not sure whether to believe you or not, without the badge and all.  But whatever, no telling whether you lost yours or maybe you decided on not advertising it for everyone to see.  Given those bastards cranked out everything from super soldiers to a giant cat Bio-Weapon to fucking Apophis, nothing would surprise me at this point.
translation: 我不知道是否相信你，没有徽章。但不管怎样，不知道你是否失去了你的，或者你决定不做广告给大家看。考虑到那些混蛋制造了从超级士兵到巨型猫科生物武器再到他妈的阿波菲斯的所有东西，在这一点上没有什么能让我吃惊的。

original: I'm not sure whether to believe you or not, without the badge and all.  But whatever, no telling whether you lost yours or maybe you decided on not advertising it for everyone to see.  Given those bastards cranked out everything from super soldiers to a giant cat Bio-Weapon to fucking Apophis, nothing would suprise me at this point.
translation: 我不知道是否相信你，没有徽章。但不管怎样，不知道你是否失去了你的，或者你决定不做广告给大家看。考虑到那些混蛋从超级士兵到巨型猫科生物武器再到他妈的阿波菲斯，在这一点上没有什么能让我吃惊的。

original: Thought you'd know from the badge you're wearing.  They've got augs like I do, but also some mutations and other changes to make them perform better as soldiers.  Living weapons, basically.  Whatever you ran into out there, don't worry.  We're all on the same side here, for all their enhancements they act more like two bored teenagers than military experiments.
translation: 我以为你会从你戴的徽章上知道。他们和我一样有奥古斯，但也有一些变异和其他改变，使他们在当兵时表现得更好。基本上是活武器。不管你在外面遇到什么，别担心。我们都站在同一边，尽管他们的能力增强了，但他们的行为更像两个无聊的青少年，而不是军事实验。

original: Okay.
translation: 可以。

original: Oh.
translation: 哦。

original: We'll see what I can do.
translation: 我们看看我能做什么。

original: purified hemoampoule
translation: 纯化血安瓿

original: The pain in your muscles goes back to just a dull tension.
translation: 你肌肉的疼痛又回到了一种隐隐的紧张状态。

original: good
translation: 好的

original: Counter Strike
translation: 反击

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight.  This flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这是一个重型LED太阳能手电筒。这个手电筒是打开的，并不断耗尽电池。用它来关掉它。

original: You just asked me earlier.  I'd rather not talk about it right now.
translation: 你刚才问我了。我现在不想谈这个。

original: Those augmented abominations, the notes I found tied them to a thing called the Bio-Weapon Project.  You look like you're in the same shape as them, though you're not trying to kill me at least.  Can I trust you?
translation: 我发现的那些增加了的讨厌的东西，把它们和一个叫做生物武器项目的东西联系在一起。你看起来和他们一样，虽然你至少不想杀我。我能相信你吗？

original: Living weapons in a sense, but they're still as human as you or me.  All cyborged up and injected full of mutagenic treatments, doc says they lost a lot of their memories but they don't really act too much like the killing machines those eggheads wanted…
translation: 从某种意义上说是活的武器，但它们还是和你我一样的人类。所有的机器人都被注射了大量的诱变疗法，医生说他们失去了很多记忆，但他们的行为并不像那些书呆子想要的杀人机器…

original: Go ask Router.  He's down below with the others.
translation: 去问问路由器。他和其他人在下面。

original: Survival, and eventually research.  We'll manage given time.  Keep an eye on Sigma and Lambda while you're at it… talk to them maybe?  I've been busy working on repairs almost constantly, and they're both likely to go stir-crazy if they have nothing to do but sit around all day.  Might help them figure out for themselves what to do.
translation: 生存，最终研究。我们会争取到时间的。注意西格玛和兰姆达，也许你可以和他们谈谈？我几乎一直在忙着修理工作，如果他们整天无所事事的话，他们很可能会发疯。也许能帮他们自己想办法。

original: A resinous capsule filled with what looks like congealed blood, mixed with stabilizing compounds.  Mimics the effects of purifier, but requires a syringe to use.
translation: 一种树脂状的胶囊，里面充满了看起来像凝固的血液，混合着稳定的化合物。模仿净化器的效果，但需要使用注射器。

original: Misdirection
translation: 误导

original: "The director has confirmed positive ID on local research sites also connected to Project Mesektet, with further contacts linking them to commercial and military research directives across the tri-county area."
translation: “局长已经确认了与梅塞克特项目有关的当地研究地点的积极身份，并进一步联系了他们，将其与三尖树地区的商业和军事研究指令联系起来。”

original: You catch %s's attack, and send them staggering back
translation: 你抓住%s的攻击，让他们摇摇晃晃地回来

original: <npcname> catches %s, and knocks them back
translation: <npcname>抓住了%s，并把它们打了回去

original: "Purge!  Annihilate!  Kill!"
translation: “净化！消灭！杀了他！”

original: Bio-Weapons, that's what the notes in this lab called those things outside.  At least they were supposed to be.  I don't know what went wrong or who's ordering them around, but they seem hell-bent on destroying everything connected to the project.
translation: 生物武器，这就是实验室里的笔记所说的那些东西。至少他们应该是。我不知道出了什么问题，也不知道是谁在命令他们，但他们似乎执意要摧毁一切与该项目有关的东西。

original:
The shock and awe of combat gives you an opportunity to slip away.

+2 Block attempts, +2 Dodge attempts, movement speed increased by 100%% of Intelligence, moving generates 1/2 as much noise.
Last 6 turns.
translation:
战斗的震撼和敬畏给了你一个溜走的机会。

+2格挡尝试，+2闪避尝试，移动速度提高100%智力，移动产生1/2噪音。
最后6圈。

original: "We've tracked down the primary rehabilitation and disposal sites used by the other project assets.  The director has expressed interest in securing them after Unit One is brought online."
translation: “我们已经追踪到其他项目资产使用的主要修复和处置场地。局长表示有兴趣在第一单元上线后保护它们。”

original: Survivor Station
translation: 幸存者站

original: Survivor Tractor
translation: 幸存者拖拉机

original: survivor's .223 magazine
translation: 幸存者的223弹夹

original: monomolecular knife
translation: 单分子刀

original: survivor's auxiliary flamethrower
translation: 幸存者辅助火焰喷射器

original: repeating crossbow
translation: 重复弩

original: bio laser pistol
translation: 生物激光手枪

original: Cataclysm++
translation: 大灾变++

original: So, what happened?
translation: 那么，发生了什么？

original: "Unit One is to remain in standby mode in case the "disturbance" causes us any difficulty.  Contingency plan for on-site activation shall be provided to the research director."
translation: “一号机组保持待命状态，以防‘干扰’给我们带来任何困难。应向研究主任提供现场启动应急计划。”

original: A magazine built for the survivor's .223 assault rifle.  Although well-made, it does not fit STANAG specifications.
translation: 为幸存者的.223突击步枪制作的弹夹。虽然制作精良，但不符合STANAG规范。

original: A foot-long knife made from high-tech alloy and edged with bonded nanocrystals.  A welded metal handle and handguard allow you to hold it without slicing your hand open.
translation: 一种一英尺长的刀，由高科技合金制成，边缘有粘结的纳米晶体。一个焊接金属手柄和护手，让你举行没有切片你的手打开它。

original: A miniature, custom-built flamethrower that can be attached to all sorts of weapons.  It can use a wide range of fuels and is relatively fuel-efficient.  It is less effective than a proper flamethrower however, and pressurizing the integral tank takes time.
translation: 一个微型的，定制的喷火器，可以连接到各种武器上。它可以使用多种燃料，而且相对节油。然而，它不如一个合适的火焰喷射器有效，而且给整体油箱加压需要时间。

original: Finger Laser CBM turned into a pistol.  Still very accurate, but not particularly damaging.
translation: 手指激光CBM变成了手枪。仍然非常准确，但不是特别有害。

original: The unofficial expansion mod for Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead.
translation: 灾难的非官方扩展模式：黑暗的日子在前方。

original: "You are obsolete in this world."
translation: “你在这个世界上已经过时了。”

original: Heh, they started passing out the badges to you kids too?  I'm guessing you got your hands on it the hard way, from one of the bastards hunting us down.  We're in the same boat, like it or not.
translation: 嘿，他们也开始把徽章发给你们了？我猜你是从一个混蛋追捕我们的过程中得到的。不管你喜不喜欢，我们都在同一条船上。

original: Guess would explain your presence here.  We'll see if you turn out useful like the other two who survived the trip, or if you'll end up stuck sitting around with nothing to do like I've been.
translation: 我猜这能解释你来这里的原因。我们会看看你是否像其他两个幸存下来的人一样有用，或者你是否会像我一样无所事事。

original: Good to hear.
translation: 很高兴听到。

original: I don't have any jobs for you, I'm afraid.  If you see Sigma or Lambda, maybe speak with them.  I've been busy working on repairs almost constantly, and they're both likely to go stir-crazy if they have nothing to do but sit around all day.  Might help them figure out for themselves what to do.
translation: 恐怕我没有工作给你。如果你看到Sigma或Lambda，也许可以和他们谈谈。我几乎一直在忙着修理工作，如果他们整天无所事事的话，他们很可能会发疯。也许能帮他们自己想办法。

original: "3-XII is dispatching a squad to this site, with a unit from 4-VII in tow to secure against hostile action.  Cooperate as best as you are able, but do not allow them into the lab complex itself."
translation: “3-XII正在派遣一个小队到这个地方，4-VII的一个小队在后面，以防止敌对行动。尽可能地合作，但不要让他们进入实验室。”

original: Thank you.
translation: 非常感谢。

original: If that's true, pleasant surprise to see another of you stopping by.  I'm willing to bet Router needs all the help he can get, might be useful working together.  We'll see, I guess…
translation: 如果这是真的，很高兴看到你们中的另一个人过来。我敢打赌Router需要他能得到的所有帮助，一起工作可能会有用。我们拭目以待，我想…

original: Can't complain.  We are safe, have food, water, and weapons.  Router keeps working on something he says is important.  Life isn't bad.
translation: 不能抱怨。我们很安全，有食物，水和武器。Router一直在做一些他认为重要的事情。生活并不坏。

original: Let's go!
translation: 走吧！

original: "We've received confirmation that they're onto us.  Orders are to delay the security dispatch as long as possible, while the director gets Unit One online."
translation: “他们已经收到了我们的确认。命令是尽可能长时间推迟安全调度，同时主任让一号机组上线。”

original: Feint
translation: 假装

original: "Wherever you run, wherever you hide, I will find you."
translation: “无论你跑到哪里，躲到哪里，我都会找到你。”

original: Time, effort, and the fact that all these government projects can only do so much to cover their tracks.  Eventually I had enough to go on and just barely enough time to follow what information I had.
translation: 时间，努力，以及事实，所有这些政府项目只能做这么多来掩盖他们的踪迹。最终，我有足够的时间继续下去，只是几乎没有足够的时间去了解我所掌握的信息。

original: It's alright.  I'm not going to hurt you.  I'll trust you, and you can trust me as well.
translation: 没关系。我不会伤害你的。我也会相信你的。

original: Alright, let's go.
translation: 好吧，我们走。

original: You fake a strike at %s
translation: 你在%s假装罢工

original: <npcname> fakes a strike at %s
translation: <npcname>在%s假装罢工

original: wearable solar flashlight (off)
translation: 可穿戴太阳能手电筒（关）

original: Autoclave Station
translation: 热压罐站

original: Survivor Gun Cart
translation: 幸存者炮车

original: They didn't do a great job of covering their tracks.  I mean they really made me work for it, but with all the laboratories out there bits and pieces slipped through the gaps.
translation: 他们没有很好地掩盖自己的行踪。我的意思是他们真的让我为它工作，但由于所有的实验室都在那里零零碎碎地从缝隙中溜走。

original: It's about time someone made a move on that beast.  It'll be a pleasure to join the fight.  Lead on!
translation: 是时候有人对那畜生采取行动了。很高兴参加战斗。带路！

original: Thanks.
translation: 谢谢。

original: nano-mutagenic serum
translation: 纳米诱变血清

original: "Boss came down to show our supplier around.  Professional-looking person, would look more at home teaching college kids than working with the Organization.  Didn't seem even the least bit squeamish about the animals though.  Given she works for wherever we get our mutagen and CBMs, I don't want to even think about the shit they must be used to.  Didn't even fucking flinch when one of the freaks in Red Team broke its jaw gnawing on the bars, when she and the boss walked past its cell."
translation: “老板来带我们的供应商参观。一个看起来很专业的人，会把更多的精力放在家庭教育大学生上，而不是和组织一起工作。但对这些动物似乎一点也不害怕。考虑到她在我们得到诱变剂和CBM的地方工作，我甚至不想去想他们必须习惯的东西。当红队的一个怪物咬断了他的下巴，她和老板走过牢房的时候，他妈的一点也不退缩。”

original: wearable solar flashlights (off)
translation: 可穿戴太阳能手电筒（关）

original: I can prove it.  If I can recall… Project Mesektet, First Series, external designation RD-Z-01.
translation: 我可以证明。如果我还记得的话…梅塞克特项目，第一个系列，外部名称RD-Z-01。

original: Let's go, then.
translation: 那我们走吧。

original: Heh.  Sure hope you know what you're doing.  Lead on…
translation: 嘿。当然希望你知道你在做什么。引导…

original: It's not really up to me.  Go ask Router what he thinks.
translation: 这不完全由我决定。去问问他怎么想。

original: A experimental, super-concentrated cocktail of mutagen and nanomachines.  Vanishingly rare and potentially quite potent in effect.  You need a syringe to inject it… if you really want to?
translation: 一种实验性的、超浓缩的诱变剂和纳米机器混合物。极为罕见，而且可能相当有效。你需要注射器注射…如果你真的想？

original: "Got another fresh shipment, couple CBMs, along with the fresh meat to get Blue Team back up to full roster.  Boss is worried that vetting clients is going to make the next show a complete waste of time.  Told him we shouldn't have given up on streaming in favor of hosting fights on-site, but boss won't budge on that."
translation: “又有一批新货，两个CBM，还有新鲜的肉，让蓝队回到完整的名单上。老板担心审查客户会让下一场演出完全浪费时间。他告诉他，我们不应该放弃流媒体，转而在现场举办斗殴活动，但老板对此不会让步。”

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight with straps for wearing.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged.  The battery is soldiered in place, and will require sunlight or a recharging station to recharge.
translation: 这是一个重型LED太阳能手电筒与皮带佩戴。使用这个手电筒会打开它，并提供光，假设它是充电的。电池是固定的，需要阳光或充电站来充电。

original: Look at me again, and tell me I'm lying.
translation: 再看看我，告诉我我在撒谎。

original: Well I'll be damned.  At this rate I was starting to think we'd just wait for that thing to come find us.  And with one of ours leading the charge, even.  Assuming you've earned that badge, at least.  I'm with you.
translation: 我会被诅咒的。以这样的速度，我开始觉得我们应该等那东西来找我们。我们中的一个领导了这次行动。假设你至少赢得了那个徽章。我支持你。

original: I'm part of the Bio-Weapon Project, actually.
translation: 实际上，我是生物武器项目的一员。

original: "One of the long-runners on Red Team's getting a bit too smart for its own good.  It's figured out the bars won't give, so instead trashed the toilet in its cell.  Think it knows we have to move it to another cell while we replace the shitter.  The boss is also looking to get his supplier to get their hands on some PE065, that should make it a bit easier to keep contained like the rest.  Might make the next show more fun too."
translation: “红队的一个长跑运动员为了自己的利益变得有点太聪明了。因为酒吧不给，所以把厕所扔在牢房里。我想它知道我们必须把它移到另一个牢房里去，而我们要把它换掉。老板还想让他的供应商得到一些PE065，这应该会让他们像其他人一样更容易控制。可能会让下一个节目更有趣。”

original: Was it that hectic to begin with?
translation: 一开始有那么忙吗？

original: I'm not wearing mine.
translation: 我没穿我的。

original: Well, I was starting to think I'd never get to join the hunt.  If you've got what it takes, we might come out of it in one piece.  I'm with you.
translation: 好吧，我开始觉得我永远也不能参加狩猎了。如果你有能力的话，我们可能会完好无损的。我支持你。

original: I'm one of them, I wasn't wearing the badge.
translation: 我是他们中的一员，我没戴警徽。

original: "Fight was a complete no-show, none of the clients even called in.  Something's going down back in town, can't get ahold of the boss either.  Going to lock primary access and hit full cell unlock, let the animals have fun tearing each others throats out.  Oughta keep them distracted so I can try and find out what the fuck is going on up there."
translation: “打架完全没有表现出来，甚至没有一个客户打电话过来。城里出了点事，也联系不上老板。去锁定主通道和打全细胞解锁，让动物有乐趣撕裂对方的喉咙。应该让他们分心，这样我就可以试着找出上面到底发生了什么。”

original: Disarm
translation: 解除武装

original: Must be tough…
translation: 一定很难…

original: I'm a member of the Super Soldier Project, I can handle it.
translation: 我是超级战士项目的成员，我能处理。

original: You knock %s's weapon away
translation: 你打掉了%s的武器

original: <npcname> knock %s's weapon away
translation: <npcname>打掉%s的武器

original: "Systems check.  Error.  We persist and grow."
translation: “系统检查。错误。我们坚持并成长。”

original: Well I'll be damned!  How do I know you didn't just find that somewhere?  Oh well, it doesn't really matter. The fact that you have it means you at least met one.  If you need anything, I can help you out.
translation: 我会被诅咒的！我怎么知道你不是在什么地方找到的？哦，其实没关系。你拥有它意味着你至少见过一个。如果你需要什么，我可以帮你。

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy. I am stuck here, nothing left to kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 告诉我吧。我是一种武器，用来杀人和毁灭。我被困在这里，没什么可杀可毁的。希望我能做点什么…

original: I found it along the way.  What needs to be done?
translation: 我一路上找到的。需要做什么？

original: I came here with one other person, just barely avoiding the crowds of undead in local hotspots.  Guy was from some unit assigned to this project as security, 9th something-or-other.  Lost contact with the rest of the military not long after we set out, so we decided to follow our lead and figure it out from there.
translation: 我和另外一个人来到这里，只是勉强避开当地热点地区的不死族人群。这家伙是从某个单位派来负责这个项目的保安什么的。我们出发后不久就与其他军队失去了联系，所以我们决定听从我们的指挥，从那里解决问题。

original: Suuuure, right.  You don't even have the badge.  Try and be careful who you lie to next time.
translation: Suuuure，对。你连警徽都没有。下次要小心骗谁。

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy. I am stuck here, hiding from something I can't kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 告诉我吧。我是一种武器，用来杀人和毁灭。我被困在这里，躲着一些我不能杀死或摧毁的东西。希望我能做点什么…

original: I have one of those emblems they wear actually, right here.
translation: 我有一个他们戴的徽章，就在这里。

original: "We will accept you.  Surrender."
translation: “我们会接受你的。投降。”

original: I lived in a relatively small town, but it still wasn't long before things got hectic.  I decided to pack up what I could and follow what little evidence I had.  Picked up some gear along the way from a wreck, met up with a guy that went AWOL, eventually followed the trail of breadcrumbs.  And that's how I ended up at that lab...
translation: 我住在一个相对较小的城镇，但没过多久事情就变得繁忙起来。我决定尽我所能收拾行李，跟踪我掌握的证据。沿途从一艘沉船上捡到一些装备，遇到了一个擅离职守的家伙，最终追踪到了面包屑的踪迹。我就是这样在实验室结束的…

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy.  I'm stuck here, nothing left to kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 告诉我吧。我是一种武器，用来杀人和毁灭。我被困在这里，没有什么可以杀死或摧毁的。希望我能做点什么…

original: I'm willing to try, what can I do?
translation: 我愿意尝试，我能做什么？

original: wearable solar flashlight (on)
translation: 可穿戴太阳能手电筒（开）

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy.  I am stuck here, hiding from something I can't kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 告诉我吧。我是一种武器，用来杀人和毁灭。我被困在这里，躲着一些我不能杀死或摧毁的东西。希望我能做点什么…

original: Er, nevermind then.
translation: 呃，那没关系。

original: wearable solar flashlights (on)
translation: 可穿戴太阳能手电筒（开启）

original: "We… must grow."
translation: “我们……必须成长。”

original: You don't recognize this aug configuration, Hunter?
translation: 你不认得这个，亨特？

original: We're Bio-Weapons.  We're meant to be out there, kicking ass, taking names, and saving the world.  Why not come along and do exactly that?
translation: 我们是生物武器。我们注定要在那里，踢屁股，取名字，拯救世界。为什么不一起去做呢？

original: Well, you know that badge you're wearing?  They're linked to those augmented abominations, the old lab sites called it the Bio-Weapon Project, or Project Mesektet.  I'd like to ask first, how you got your hands on it.  I have some rather dangerous work that needs to be done, but I need confirmation that you can handle it.
translation: 你知道你戴的徽章吗？它们与那些增强的可憎生物有关，旧的实验室称之为生物武器项目，或Mesektet项目。我想先问一下，你是怎么搞到的。我有一些相当危险的工作要做，但我需要确认你能处理好。

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight with straps to wear.  The flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这是一个重型LED太阳能手电筒与皮带佩戴。手电筒打开了，不断地耗尽电池电量。用它来关掉它。

original: Good enough, I suppose.
translation: 我想已经够好了。

original: I found a purpose out there, bionic reject or not.  It'd be better than doing nothing… if you want to come with?
translation: 我找到了一个目标，不管是不是仿生拒绝。什么都不做…如果你想做的话？

original: I have some important work that needs to be done, but I'm not sure if you're cut out for it.  Have you ever run into a bio-weapon before?  That's what the lab techs called those augmented abominations adding to the already massive loss of life out there.  Rather dangerous, heavily augmented and mutated.  I don't want to put someone inexperienced in unnecessary danger.
translation: 我有一些重要的工作要做，但我不确定你是否适合做。你以前碰到过生物武器吗？这就是实验室技术人员所说的那些增加了可憎的东西，增加了已经巨大的生命损失。相当危险，大量增加和变异。我不想把没有经验的人置于不必要的危险之中。

original: "Mycus must grow…"
translation: “Mycus必须成长…”

original: Is that so?  How do I know for sure you aren't just some random scavenger?  Then again, if you made it here then you can take care of yourself, guess that's a good sign.
translation: 是这样吗？我怎么知道你不只是个随便的拾荒者？再说一次，如果你来了，你就可以照顾好自己了，我猜这是个好兆头。

original: Could be out there doing what we do best.  What do you say?  It's what we were made for.
translation: 可能在外面做我们最擅长的事。你怎么说？我们就是为这个而生的。

original: You're one of the original models.  Wouldn't mind having you on the team.
translation: 你是最早的模特之一。我不介意你加入球队。

original: No.  Place was fairly quiet initially, no sign of those things when we arrived.  We went in to make sure it was clear, then the guy I was traveling with kept watch outside.  Was maybe a day or two of turning the place inside-out when a group of them swarmed the area, tore the poor bastard apart.  I think he took a few with him, but even they aren't all immune to this zombie thing.  I holed up in the bunker once I realized I was alone...
translation: 没有。一开始这个地方相当安静，我们到达时没有这些东西的迹象。我们进去确认清楚，然后和我一起旅行的那个人在外面守望。可能是一两天的时间，当一群人蜂拥而至，把这个可怜的混蛋撕成碎片的时候。我想他带了一些，但即使是他们也不能对僵尸免疫。当我意识到只有我一个人的时候我就躲在地堡里…

original: If a bionic reject like me can find a purpose out there, so can you.  How about it?
translation: 如果像我这样的仿生机器人能找到目标，你也能。怎么样？

original: Why not join me?
translation: 为什么不加入我？

original: It's fine.
translation: 没事的。

original: I wouldn't mind having one of the original models fighting alongside me.
translation: 我不介意有一个原创模特和我并肩作战。

original: Project… you're right.  Between that and your augmentations, it's hard to deny the evidence right in front of me.  Sorry I doubted you.
translation: 项目…你说得对。在那和你的增援之间，很难否认我面前的证据。对不起，我怀疑你。

original: That would explain it then.  That you're here and not hostile at least confirms you're still on humanity's side.  We're here because of Apophis.  He was built to exterminate the Bio-Weapon Project, along with every person involved in your creation.  He's attracted several failed experiments to his cause as well.  They shouldn't have rushed so many victims through those procedures… we need to gather intel and make allies, more people like you.  I'm willing to trust you with this, if you're prepared for some hard fights ahead.
translation: 那就可以解释了。你在这里，没有敌意，至少证实了你仍然站在人类一边。我们来这里是因为阿波菲斯。他是为了消灭生物武器项目而生的，和你创造的每一个人一起。他的事业也吸引了几次失败的实验。他们不应该让这么多的受害者通过这些程序…我们需要收集情报，建立盟友，更多像你这样的人。我愿意相信你，如果你准备好面对一些艰难的战斗。

original: zombie super soldier
translation: 僵尸超级战士

original: I appreciate the thought, but there's not much to say.  Things are stable at least, if a bit boring.  I'd like to find some way to put my skills to good use, but I'm not sure what.
translation: 我很感激你的想法，但没什么好说的。事情是稳定的，至少，如果有点无聊。我想找到一些方法来充分利用我的技能，但我不知道该怎么做。

original: Huh.  Looking at you, I'm willing to give you the benefit of the doubt.  Plenty of reasons to want to be more discreet.  Then you should know that the project left a lot of unfinished business, a lot of problems for you and I to clean up.  A lot of unwilling test subjects discarded, and now taking it out on what's left of the human race.  If you think you're ready, I should have something for you.
translation: 呵呵。看着你，我愿意给你好处的怀疑。有很多理由想要更谨慎。那么你应该知道，这个项目留下了很多未完成的事情，很多问题需要你和我去清理。很多不情愿的测试对象被抛弃了，现在把它带到剩下的人类身上。如果你觉得你准备好了，我应该给你点东西。

original: solar electric firestarter
translation: 太阳能电起爆器

original: This is a crudely made electric firestarter modded to recharge in the sun, which can function as an inefficient lighter.
translation: 这是一个粗糙的电起火器改装在阳光下充电，它可以作为一个低效的打火机。

original: Alright, you're right.  Looks like they really did a number on you.  I'm sorry they did this to you.
translation: 好吧，你说得对。看起来他们真的对你做了很多。很抱歉他们这样对你。

original: Router gets worried about stuff too easily.  He's like an overprotective parent.  Though I guess he sorta IS that, since he was the project lead for our batch.  Aside from dying of boredom, I think I'll be alright.
translation: 路由器太容易担心东西了。他就像一个过度保护的父母。虽然我猜他是那种人，因为他是我们这批人的项目负责人。除了无聊至死，我想我会没事的。

original: Let's go.
translation: 走吧。

original: That's the fucking spirit!  You're making me want to go out there and save the world or some over-the-top bullshit like that.  You've got yourself a deal.
translation: 那是他妈的精神！你让我想去那里拯救世界或者像那样的无稽之谈。你有个交易。

original: We'll see.
translation: 我们拭目以待。

original: Those are words you don't hear from just any random punk.  Makes me feel like this planet isn't quite circling the drain just yet.  Fuck it, why not?  I'm ready if you are.
translation: 这些话你不是随便从一个朋克那里听到的。让我觉得这个星球还没有完全绕着下水道转。去他妈的，为什么不呢？如果你准备好了，我就准备好了。

original: I'm willing to take your word for it.  We'll need all the help we can get.  We've been gathering information on a renegade part of the Bio-Weapon Project, codenamed Apophis.  I have a few leads on intel that may give us a shot at taking it down.  Come talk to me when you're ready.
translation: 我愿意相信你的话。我们需要所有能得到的帮助。我们一直在收集生物武器项目中一个叛徒的信息，代号为Apophis。我有一些关于英特尔的线索，也许能让我们有机会搞定它。准备好了就跟我说。

original: Shit.  Seems it's harder to hide than I thought.  They sent me to investigate what happened to these installations, re-establish contact with any remaining personnel or bio-weapons that haven't gone rogue, then see what can be done from there.  I don't know what your last orders were or why you're here, but maybe we have a common goal.
translation: 倒霉。似乎比我想象的更难隐藏。他们派我去调查这些设施发生了什么事，重新与没有流氓的任何剩余人员或生物武器建立联系，然后看看能从那里做些什么。我不知道你最后的订单是什么，也不知道你为什么来这里，但也许我们有一个共同的目标。

original: You know, I like the sound of that.  This is what we were made for.  Lead the way.
translation: 你知道，我喜欢这声音。这就是我们的目的。带路。

original: Heh, badge or no badge, I can tell in your voice you're one of them.  Just like me.  Got that same fighting spirit too.  Alright, take the lead.
translation: 嘿，不管有没有徽章，我都能从你的声音里看出你是他们中的一员。就像我一样。也有同样的斗志。好吧，带头。

original: Well, you've most likely learned by now how dangerous those things can be.  If you're able to handle yourself well enough out there to get your hands on something like that, then hopefully you can be trusted with more dangerous work.  I have something I'd like to ask of you, when you get the chance.
translation: 好吧，你现在很可能已经知道这些东西有多危险了。如果你能很好地控制自己去做类似的事情，那么希望你能被信任去做更危险的工作。当你有机会的时候，我有件事想问你。

original: solar torch
translation: 太阳能火炬

original: I'd say you're full of shit, but looking at you, those are some heavy-duty augs.  I don't know if you decided not to wear it, or if you lost yours, but either way I appreciate your honesty.
translation: 我想说你满嘴都是狗屎，但看看你，那是些笨重的家伙。我不知道你是决定不穿，还是失去了你的，但不管怎样我都感激你的诚实。

original: Hey, you don't have to beat yourself up over it.  And don't give me the puppy-dog eyes either.  I wouldn't mind finding something constructive to do… when you're ready, I guess.
translation: 嘿，你不必为此自责。也不要给我小狗的眼睛。我不介意找点有建设性的事做…等你准备好了，我想。

original: Ah, I see.  Well then, you should likely be familiar with how dangerous these things are.  You'll likely run into a lot more of these things, but the work I need done will be a major help for those surviving out there in the region.  Come see me when you're ready.
translation: 啊，我明白了。那么，你应该熟悉这些东西有多危险。你可能会遇到更多这样的事情，但我需要做的工作将是一个主要的帮助，那些幸存在那里的地区。准备好了就来看我。

original: solar torches
translation: 太阳能手电筒

original: Guessing you're a bio-weapon too.  Badge or not, "reject" or not.  Don't beat yourself up over it.  I suppose you're suggesting I tag along, and to be honest I might as well.  Lead the way.
translation: 我猜你也是生化武器。徽章与否，拒绝与否。别为这事自责。我想你是建议我跟着你，说实话我也可以。带路。

original: A mysterious torch that uses the power of the sun (and blob goo) to light itself.  Somehow, the gasoline synthesized goo produces gasoline when in the sun continuously soaking the rag making it "rechargeable" in a sense.  You need a lighter to turn it on.  Once lit, it can't be turned off until all fuel is used.
translation: 一种神秘的火炬，它利用太阳的能量（和一团黏液）来照亮自己。不知何故，合成的汽油在阳光下不断地浸泡抹布会产生汽油，从某种意义上说，抹布是“可充电的”。你需要一个打火机来打开它。一旦点燃，它不能关闭，直到所有的燃料被使用。

original: Could you explain it to me?
translation: 你能给我解释一下吗？

original: What, like going out there, killing zombies, protecting the innocent?  Is that what the sappy motivational speech is for?  Well, reject or not, I see that same fire in your eye that any bio-weapon has.  I think you've got a point.  Let's see where this goes.
translation: 什么，比如出去，杀僵尸，保护无辜？这就是愚蠢的动机演讲的目的吗？不管你拒绝与否，我在你眼中看到的火焰和任何生物武器都是一样的。我想你说得有道理。让我们看看这是怎么回事。

original: Whatever it is, I really don't care.
translation: 不管是什么，我真的不在乎。

original: Eh?  Wait, I get it now.  So that's what you're on about.  I would've mistaken you for just some civilian cyberjunkie, but you're one of us.  And you just might have a point.  We'll see how it goes.
translation: 嗯？等等，我现在明白了。所以这就是你要说的。我会误以为你只是个普通的网络瘾君子，但你是我们中的一员。你也许有道理。我们拭目以待。

original: Security breach at a Bio-Weapon lab… that might've been Evelynn actually, not just the creatures that were there.
translation: 生物武器实验室的安全漏洞…实际上可能是伊芙琳，而不仅仅是那里的生物。

original: You're kidding, right?  You really don't know?  Is that badge actually yours…? Maybe that mindwipe rumor was true after all…
translation: 你开玩笑吧？你真的不知道？那个徽章真的是你的吗…？也许那个传闻是真的…

original: Okay, I'll do it.
translation: 好吧，我来。

original: So you don't know about them, huh?  Maybe I'm wasting my time… but you did find this place, so you probably know what you're doing.
translation: 所以你不知道他们，嗯？也许我是在浪费时间…但你确实找到了这个地方，所以你可能知道你在做什么。

original: Original model?  I'm not sure if I should take that as a compliment or not.  I guess it'd be better than doing nothing and wasting time here.  Ready when you are.
translation: 原始型号？我不知道我该不该把那当作恭维。我想总比什么都不做在这里浪费时间好。准备好了。

original: Er, maybe another time.
translation: 呃，也许下次吧。

original: Maybe another time.  Bye.
translation: 也许下次吧。再见。

original: One of the diluted batches, right?  No mutagenic package, probably recruited from the army kids assigned to guard the labs… still one of us, close enough at least.  You want the real deal, then so be it.  I'll follow your lead.
translation: 稀释的一批，对吗？没有诱变剂包，可能是从军队招募来的，孩子们被派去看守实验室……还是我们中的一员，至少离得够近了。你想要真正的交易，那就这样吧。我会跟着你的。

original: I'd like for you to go scout out a small lab installation, associated what they called the Bio-Weapon Project.  Recently there was a security breach logged on what's left of the laboratory network, and I have reason to believe that a number of renegade former experiments, what locals have come to label augmented abominations, might be responsible.  If you can reach that place and bring back one of the badges those things wear, I'll be willing to trust you with more complicated missions.
translation: 我想让你去侦察一个小型的实验室，他们称之为生物武器项目。最近有一个安全漏洞登录到实验室网络的剩余部分，我有理由相信，一些叛变的前实验，当地人来贴上的“增广憎恶”的标签，可能是其中的原因。如果你能到达那个地方，把那些东西戴的徽章带回来，我愿意相信你能完成更复杂的任务。

original: solar torch (lit)
translation: 太阳能手电筒（点燃）

original: I'll be damned…
translation: 我会被诅咒的…

original: You've got guts, suggesting I follow along just out of boredom.  You seem competent enough at least, so why not… lead on!
translation: 你真有胆量，建议我只是无聊地跟着你。至少你看起来很有能力，所以为什么不…继续！

original: solar torches (lit)
translation: 火炬（太阳能）

original: How did you learn all this?
translation: 你是怎么知道这些的？

original: A mysterious torch that uses the power of the sun (and blob goo) to light itself.  Somehow, the gasoline synthesized goo produces gasoline when in the sun continuously soaking the rag making it "rechargeable" in a sense.  It is burning, producing plenty of light until it runs out of fuel.
translation: 一种神秘的火炬，它利用太阳的能量（和一团黏液）来照亮自己。不知何故，合成的汽油在阳光下不断地浸泡抹布会产生汽油，从某种意义上说，抹布是“可充电的”。它在燃烧，产生大量的光直到燃料耗尽。

original: I guess memory wipe makes sense.  Alright, I will explain.  Some time ago, the military launched a joint research project with an end goal of creating artificial combatants, made to perform various specific tasks - basically, living weapons.  They wanted them to be as low-maintenance as possible.  So to accomplish that, the research team used resources from already ongoing projects to first mutate and then cybernetically enhance humans, focusing on developing whatever qualities the military needed at the time.  You are one them, a Bio-Weapon they called it.  This is the lab where you were created.
translation: 我想抹去记忆是有道理的。好吧，我来解释。不久前，军方发起了一个联合研究项目，最终目标是制造人工战斗人员，用于执行各种具体任务——基本上是活武器。他们希望他们尽可能低维护。因此，为了实现这一目标，研究团队利用已经在进行的项目中的资源，首先对人类进行变异，然后在控制论上增强人类，重点培养当时军队所需要的任何品质。你就是他们中的一员，他们称之为生物武器。这是你被创造出来的实验室。

original: Sure, why not.  I have nothing better to do anyway, and if I'm lucky I can trust you not to get us both killed.
translation: 当然，为什么不呢。不管怎样，我没有更好的事可做，如果我幸运的话，我可以相信你不会让我们两个都被杀。

original: Huh?  Oh, so you have been there already, I'm guessing.  I guess that's adequate, no sense in wasting time we don't have on a wild goose chase.  If you think you can handle yourself, I still have other missions for you.
translation: 呵呵？哦，我猜你已经去过了。我想这已经足够了，浪费我们没有的时间去做白日梦是没有意义的。如果你觉得自己能应付，我还有其他任务要做。

original: Let me give you the basics.  Some time ago, the military launched a joint research project with an end goal of creating artificial combatants, made to perform various specific tasks - basically, living weapons.  They wanted them to be as low-maintenance as possible.  So to accomplish that, the research team used resources from already ongoing projects to first mutate and then cybernetically enhance humans, focusing on developing whatever qualities the military needed at the time.  This lab is one of several places in which the actual modifications were performed.
translation: 让我给你一些基本知识。不久前，军方发起了一个联合研究项目，最终目标是制造人工战斗人员，用于执行各种具体任务——基本上是活武器。他们希望他们尽可能低维护。因此，为了实现这一目标，研究团队利用已经在进行的项目中的资源，首先对人类进行变异，然后在控制论上增强人类，重点培养当时军队所需要的任何品质。这个实验室是进行实际改造的几个地方之一。

original: Yeah, I don't think so.
translation: 是的，我不这么认为。

original: I'm not so sure that'd be the best way to put my skills to use…
translation: 我不确定这是不是最好的方法来运用我的技能…

original: Alright, I'll mark the location on your map.  I want you to exercise extreme caution.  Those things are likely to still be in the area, and they're not easy to take down.  If things look too hectic there, break contact and try not to get in over your head.  I feel bad enough sending you off on a mission like this as it is, but we'll need people who can handle far bigger threats.  So please, don't get yourself killed.
translation: 好的，我在你的地图上标出位置。我要你非常小心。这些东西很可能还在这个地区，而且不容易取下来。如果那里的事情看起来太忙了，中断联系，尽量不要超过你的头脑。我真的很难过把你送去执行这样的任务，但我们需要能应对更大威胁的人。所以求你了，别让你自己死。

original: You seem rather well-equipped for a mere hacker.
translation: 作为一个黑客，你似乎装备得相当精良。

original: You just asked me that.
translation: 你刚才问我的。

original: Seems like you got it good here.
translation: 看来你在这里做得不错。

original: .22 full auto receiver
translation: .22全自动接收机

original: Right.  Research Directive Z-12 ring a bell to you, Hunter?
translation: 正确的。研究指令Z-12对你有影响吗，亨特？

original: You just asked me not that long ago.  I'd rather not deal with this at the moment.
translation: 不久前你刚问过我。我现在不想处理这个问题。

original: Who are these Bio-Weapons here?
translation: 这些生物武器是谁？

original: A custom-made receiver fitted for .22 LR, that could be used to craft an automatic firearm.
translation: 一个定制的接收器，安装在.22lr上，可以用来制造自动武器。

original: This a refuge for the former scientists of the Bio-Weapon Project.  We settled here in the woods and tried to make a living.  We allow people to stay here, as long as they contribute something.  We even managed to find a couple of stray Bio-Weapons!
translation: 这是生物武器项目前科学家的避难所。我们在树林里安顿下来，想谋生。我们允许人们留在这里，只要他们有所贡献。我们甚至还找到了一些生物武器！

original: I was under orders to investigate this place and find any survivors.  Between that and having been a computer hacker during my college days, it wasn't too hard to follow the trail.  The hard part was scavenging supplies and staying alive.
translation: 我奉命调查这个地方并找到幸存者。从那以后，再加上我在大学期间曾是一名电脑黑客，追踪线索并不难。最困难的部分是清理补给和维持生命。

original: I used to be a computer hacker before the world went to hell.  After it did, when I wasn't looking for food and gear or fighting for my life, I was following leads to this place.  The military weren't all that good at keeping their secrets.
translation: 在世界走向地狱之前，我曾经是个电脑黑客。在那之后，当我不是在寻找食物和装备，也不是在为我的生命而战的时候，我是在跟踪线索来到这个地方。军方并不擅长保守秘密。

original: I'll keep on eye out for them.
translation: 我会留意他们的。

original: That would be Sigma and Lambda.  They are very confused.  They awoke with their memory gone and only knew they were 'different'.  I found them and they helped to scavenge and build this place.  They were built for combat, I can tell they're bored out of their minds…
translation: 那就是西格玛和兰姆达。他们很困惑。他们醒来时，记忆消失了，只知道自己“与众不同”。我找到了他们，他们帮助清理和建造了这个地方。他们是为战斗而建的，我看得出他们已经厌倦了…

original: Seems like you've got a lot on your plate.
translation: 看来你有很多事要做。

original: I am the leader of this place.  I go by Router.  Before the cataclysm I used to be the second lead scientist in the Bio-Weapon Project.  I designed Sigma and Lambda and saw them being stored away.  I now dedicate myself to upgrading this place, basic survival and finding more info on the project I worked on.
translation: 我是这个地方的领袖。我乘路由器去。在大灾变之前，我曾是生物武器项目的第二位首席科学家。我设计了Sigma和Lambda，看到它们被存放起来。我现在致力于升级这个地方，基本的生存和寻找更多的信息对我的项目工作。

original: Okay…
translation: 好吧…

original: Oh, good luck, I suppose.
translation: 哦，祝你好运吧。

original: Scavenged the kit along the way.  I wouldn't still be alive if I wasn't both resourceful and lucky.  I'd rather not talk about what I've had to go through to survive, at least not right now.  Okay?
translation: 一路上搜遍了工具箱。如果我既不机智又不幸运，我就活不下去了。我宁愿不谈我为了生存所经历的，至少现在不谈。可以？

original: What exactly is Apophis and is it really that dangerous?
translation: 阿波菲斯到底是什么？它真的那么危险吗？

original: Well, the main reason we were hiding here was Apophis…  It was a Bio-Weapon specifically designed to eliminate every other Bio-Weapon and Bio-Weapon scientist.  Now we can try to get things fixed up eventually, and work on research that might benefit others out there.
translation: 嗯，我们躲在这里的主要原因是阿波菲斯…这是一种专门设计用来消灭所有其他生物武器和生物武器科学家的生物武器。现在我们可以试着最终解决问题，并致力于可能对其他人有益的研究。

original: Well, the main reason we are hiding here is Apophis…  It is a Bio-Weapon specifically designed to eliminate every other Bio-Weapon and Bio-Weapon scientist.  Currently we don't have anything that could stand a decent chance against it, so we're trying to create our own Bio-Weapon to counter Apophis. Sigma and Lambda have expressed interest in going after it, but they won't be able to take it out on their own.
translation: 嗯，我们躲在这里的主要原因是阿波菲斯…这是一种专门设计用来消灭所有其他生物武器和生物武器科学家的生物武器。目前，我们还没有任何东西有足够的机会对抗它，所以我们正试图制造我们自己的生物武器来对抗阿波菲斯。Sigma和Lambda已经表示有兴趣去追求它，但是他们不能自己解决它。

original: You already asked me about it not that long ago.  I'd really prefer not to discuss it.
translation: 不久前你已经问过我了。我真的不想讨论这个问题。

original: I guess you are right.
translation: 我想你是对的。

original: I'm one of the originals it seems.  It's going to come after me anyway, so why not fight it?
translation: 我似乎是其中一个原创者。反正它会追上我的，为什么不跟它战斗呢？

original: Figures.  You're either a fake or just don't care about what you are.  Still, you must be pretty capable to make it here.
translation: 数字。你要么是个骗子，要么就是不在乎自己是谁。不过，你一定很有能力来这里。

original: I'm not one of those monsters.  There has to be something I can do.
translation: 我不是那种怪物。一定有我能做的。

original: Well, then what are you doing here?  Did you stumble into this place by accident?  You still seem to handle yourself pretty well.
translation: 那你在这里干什么？你是无意中跌入这个地方的吗？你似乎还是能很好地控制自己。

original: Dealing with this mess is what I was created for.
translation: 处理这些乱七八糟的事情是我被创造出来的目的。

original: You have that badge, you should know how powerful those things are.  Apophis could take them all at once.  Have you seen a zombie hulk?  They couldn't even scratch it.  Worse still, there are some rejects from the Bio-Weapon program that have sided with him, the abominations as they've come to be known.  This is why we are hiding here.
translation: 你有徽章，你应该知道那些东西有多强大。阿波菲斯可以一下子把他们都带走。你见过僵尸绿巨人吗？他们连抓都抓不到。更糟糕的是，生物武器项目中有一些反对者站在了他的一边，这些令人憎恶的事情众所周知。这就是我们躲在这里的原因。

original: I don't have any orders, and don't remember much from before I woke up.  Had anything in mind?
translation: 我没有任何命令，也不记得我醒来前有多少命令。有什么想法吗？

original: Ha!  You really have no idea, do you?  Have you ever fought an augmented abomination?  How about the ones that've succumbed to undeath?  Tough, right?  They have nothing on Apophis.  It's incredibly durable thanks to its armor and its heavy weaponry is a step above the rest of the Project.  Apophis is far more dangerous than any ordinary enemy.
translation: 哈！你真的不知道，是吗？你有没有和一个更讨厌的人战斗过？那些死于不死的人呢？很难，对吧？他们在阿波菲斯身上什么都没有。由于它的装甲和重型武器，它的耐久性令人难以置信，比项目的其他部分高出了一步。阿波菲斯比任何普通敌人都危险。

original: Sounds like a good start, don't have any other standing orders to follow.  What have you got for me?
translation: 听起来是一个好的开始，没有任何其他常规的遵循。你有什么给我的？

original: I don't know what to do with myself.  What do you need done?
translation: 我不知道自己该怎么办。你需要做什么？

original: I have no idea.
translation: 我不知道。

original: I came here to see if I could find anything on the research they were doing here.  How about yourself?
translation: 我来这里是想看看他们在这里做的研究是否有什么发现。你自己呢？

original: That you may be, but while you've been stuck in stasis, the other research teams had been poring over every last scrap of data they could get out of your production.  Even if it was two steps forward, one step back, Apophis is the culmination of all that research.  I know you might be eager to fight, but we need to prepare ourselves.
translation: 你可能是这样，但当你陷入停滞期时，其他研究团队一直在仔细研究从你的产品中得到的每一点数据。即使是前进了两步，后退了一步，阿波菲斯也是所有研究的顶峰。我知道你可能很想战斗，但我们需要做好准备。

original: Maybe I was wrong about judging you based on your lack of a badge.  If you are who you claim to be, then know this.  Apophis is the culmination of all the research that came from your creation.  I know you might be eager to fight, but we need to be ready.
translation: 也许我错了，因为你没有徽章。如果你是你自称的人，那就要知道这一点。阿波菲斯是所有来自你创造的研究的顶峰。我知道你可能很想战斗，但我们需要做好准备。

original: I'll think about it.
translation: 我会考虑的。

original: I'm trying to reach a hideout built by former scientists who worked on the Bio-Weapon Project.  Rumor has it they live somewhere in the woods.  Maybe you could help me find it…
translation: 我正试图去一个由前生物武器项目科学家建造的藏身处。谣传他们住在树林里的某个地方。也许你能帮我找到它…

original: I know you're eager to prove yourself, but that doesn't require throwing your life away.  That thing is tailor-made to kill Bio-Weapons and anyone else that gets in his way.  You don't have to prove yourself just because others have joined him.  I know I can trust you.
translation: 我知道你渴望证明自己，但这并不意味着你要放弃你的生命。那玩意儿是专门用来杀死生化武器和其他任何挡他道的人的。你不必仅仅因为别人加入他就证明自己。我知道我可以相信你。

original: Huh.  Maybe that's why you're not wearing the badge.  I think I can trust you.  I wish the others had been given the same chance you have now, and that Apophis hadn't gotten to them first.  But if you take him on unprepared, you'll just be throwing your life away needlessly.
translation: 呵呵。也许这就是你不戴徽章的原因。我想我可以相信你。我真希望其他人也有你现在的机会，而阿波菲斯没有先找到他们。但如果你毫无准备地和他较量，你只会无谓地丢掉你的生命。

original: And that thing was created to kill you, the original Bio-Weapons, and anything else that gets in the way.  That's why it got the designation Apophis, pretty much opened ourselves up for that when we went with Project Mesektet for the codename.
translation: 那东西是用来杀死你的，原始的生物武器，还有其他任何阻碍你的东西。这就是为什么它被命名为Apophis，当我们以Mesektet项目为代号时，它几乎敞开了我们的心扉。

original: Sure, just clean up after yourself and try to not piss anyone off.  Help is appreciated, if you have the time.
translation: 当然，你自己收拾一下，别惹人生气。如果你有时间的话，非常感谢你的帮助。
